name: ¡Puzzle in Time!
description:
Story

[...translator calibrated !]

What the hell have they done at the Fundation of Artefact Revival Timespace?!?
I've told them so many times that a T-Rex cannot handle a managing console with so many buttons...
I mean you don't have to play with him 42th times to PDTA-VR to understand where the problem is! Too short is too short!

[environment scanning...]

Now, where did I landed? And also what "now" mean? I mean "when" are we?

[...environment scanned]

[Year 2755, November 23th - planet TRAF-47]

What?!?
It's the fifth day that I'm coming back here and now... ...at least that same given date... My timespace capsule is completely broken!

[timespace capsule localized]

Ok then, let's try to not die today or whatever iteration it is of "today"...
Wait a minute, was that button there the last time?
I'm always a bit confused once Stuck in a Loop

Description

So you are a Dino working for the F.A.R.T. Academy which travel both Space and Time. Unfortunately your buddy cannot push a button any further than his gigantic "nose"... Damn, these arms are so short... So now you're lost somewhere, someday or any combination of these. The only thing you can be sure is that's not the first time you are reviving this moment. Instead of complaining yourself try leveraging your memories of the past future to do better this future time.

Try solving the puzzle by leveraging your past dead versions of yourself. Once a level is solved, just try doing better and beat the highest scores which in fact are the smallest number of steps. Just move your Dino's character with [ZQSD or WASD or Arrows] and interact with your environment. Pay attention to any trap that can occur including the copies of your past lives.

Controls Keyboard

Movements : ZQSD/WASD/Arrows
